ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Timepoint/visit label
Did the incident leading up to your hospitalization involve actual or threatened death, serious injury, or sexual violence?
To what extent has this incident upset you?
Notes: 1 = Not at all; 7 = Extremely or totally; -99 = Missing

ElementDescription: When thinking about this incident, how badly do you feel about it?
Notes: 1 = Not at all; 7 = Extremely or totally; -99 = Missing

ElementDescription: How unpleasant has this incident been for you?
Notes: 1 = Not at all; 7 = Extremely or totally; -99 = Missing

ElementDescription: To what extent was the incident your own fault?
Notes: 1 = Not at all; 7 = Extremely or totally; -99 = Missing

ElementDescription: To what extent do you believe your own risk-taking behavior was responsible for this incident?
Notes: 1 = Not at all; 7 = Extremely or totally; -99 = Missing

ElementDescription: To what extent do you believe your alcohol consumption was responsible for this incident?
Notes: 1 = Not at all; 7 = Extremely or totally; -99 = Missing

ElementDescription: To what extent has this incident caused you physical pain or discomfort?
To what extent has this incident caused you emotional or psychological discomfort distress?
Notes: 1 = No emotional distress; 7 = Extreme emotional distress; -99 = Missing

ElementDescription: To what extent will this incident have a major impact on your life?
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 4 = Neutral; 7 = Strongly agree; -99 = Missing

ElementDescription: To what extent was this incident life threatening?
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 4 = Neutral; 7 = Strongly agree; -99 = Missing

ElementDescription: This incident makes me afraid.
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 4 = Neutral; 7 = Strongly agree; -99 = Missing

ElementDescription: This incident has given me a real scare.
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 4 = Neutral; 7 = Strongly agree; -99 = Missing

ElementDescription: When I think about this incident, I get afraid about what might happen to me.
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 4 = Neutral; 7 = Strongly agree; -99 = Missing
